title: UN report warns of catastrophic climate tipping points: California is nearing several
description: Humanity is on course to transgress multiple global "tipping points" that could lead to irreversible instability or the complete collapse of ecological and institutional systems, a United Nations report has warned.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: One of California's riskiest volcanoes is very active. Is an eruption coming?
description: One of California's riskiest volcanoes has for decades been undergoing geological changes and seismic activity, which are sometimes a precursor to an eruption, but—thankfully—no supervolcanic eruptions are expected.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Life on Earth under 'existential threat': climate scientists
description: Climate change poses an "existential threat" to life on Earth, prominent scientists warned Tuesday, in an assessment on this year's avalanche of heat records and weather extremes that they said are hitting more ferociously than expected.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: 1.6 million acres of Great Plains grasslands were destroyed in 2021 alone, World Wildlife Fund says
description: Over the course of 12 months, an area of Great Plains grasslands bigger than the state of Delaware was erased from the map.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Saturday Citations: Mars limnology, phage immunology, quantum technology. Plus: The mushrooms are coming
description: This week, we reported on LIGO upgrades, parasitic fungi and a new analysis of Curiosity rover data. Also, did you know that viruses also attack bacteria? But at that scale, it's a lot less like catching a cold and a lot more like Harry Dean Stanton encountering the xenomorph in "Alien."
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Scientists develop new method to create stable, efficient next-gen solar cells
description: Next-generation solar materials are cheaper and more sustainable to produce than traditional silicon solar cells, but hurdles remain in making the devices durable enough to withstand real-world conditions. A new technique developed by a team of international scientists could simplify the development of efficient and stable perovskite solar cells, named for their unique crystalline structure that excels at absorbing visible light.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Study uncovers giant fluctuation-enhanced phonon magnetic moments in a polar antiferromagnet
description: Phonons, quasi-particles associated with sounds or lattice vibrations, can carry momentum and angular momentum. However, these quasi-particles are commonly considered to possess negligible magnetic moments.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Remains of 3,000-mile-wide 'lost continent' discovered on ocean floor, study says
description: While Atlantis—a fabled continent said to have been swallowed by the sea—continues to elude its seekers, another long-lost and less famous land mass has been discovered at the bottom of the ocean.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Why did Hurricane Otis 'explosively' intensify off Mexico?
description: Hurricane Otis caused at least 27 deaths and major damage as it battered Mexico's beachside city of Acapulco as a scale-topping category 5 storm, according to officials.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
